"Iron Needles":
"I've been asked to come up with a salad with a brand
new texture. Specifically, they want vegetables with
a novel texture and other totally unreasonable things
like that. It's enough to drive me nuts! Then again, I've
heard rumors about a really tough kind of pine needle
from a tree that grows in harsh environments. How
could a gourmand like me ignore an ingredient like
that? You wouldn't mind getting some for me,
would you? *Lost Sea Area Only.
Target: D-arkers level 28 or higher"

"実は今、新しい食感が味わえる
サラダメニューの提案を求められたの！
とはいえ、既存の野菜だけじゃねぇ……。
でも、噂によると過酷な環境で
生き延びてる硬質な針葉は、うまみ成分が
すごい凝縮されてるらしいわ。
そうと聞いたら、料理人として黙っている
わけにもいかないし、探してきてくれない？
※砂漠エリア限定
Lv.28～のダーカーが対象"
